kth.csc.inda
Interface UndirectedGraph

All Known Implementing Classes:
ListGraph, MatrixGraph
public interface UndirectedGraph

An undirected graph with a fixed number of vertices. The vertices are accessed using integers from 0 to V-1, were V is the number of vertices in the graph. Edges may be added or removed from the graph. An edge may have an optional non-negative cost.

Version:
2009-02-13
Author:
Stefan Nilsson
